/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a sweeping view of the road below. The highway, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. A white car can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape.
